alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 20 at 5:44PM MDT until March 21 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT MONDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 6 PM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...The Custer County Plains, the Pennington County Plains and the Southern Meade County Plains. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 9 AM MDT Monday. For the Wind Advisory, from 9 AM to 6 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...The high winds may damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Persons outdoors should watch for flying or falling objects that may injure you. If you are driving, be prepared for sudden wind gusts that can cause you to lose control of your vehicle, especially on open stretches, or as you approach the crest of hills. Also be alert for debris or dust blowing across the road.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains
